channel.title: Posts on 食無魚
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on 食無魚

item.title: Write Post With Emacs
item.description: 载入包管理器 leaf(or use-package,etc) ;; leaf @https://github.com/conao3/leaf.el (require 'leaf) (eval-and-compile (setq leaf-expand-minimally nil) (setq leaf-defaults '(:ensure nil))) (leaf leaf-keywords :require t :config (leaf-keywords-init)) 载入emacs扩展 easy-hugo ;; easy-hugo @https://github.com/masasam/emacs-easy-hugo (leaf easy-hugo :commands easy-hugo :init (setq easy-hugo-basedir "~/Code/blog/" easy-hugo-postdir "content/posts/" easy-hugo-url "https://liuyinz.github.io/" easy-hugo-preview-url "http://localhost:1313/" easy-hugo-server-flags "-D") :config ;; HACK search with consult-ripgrep (defun easy-hugo-consult () "Search for blog article with

item.title: Set Blog With Hugo
item.description: 目录 安装并准备环境 设置主题 撰写首篇博客 设置 pages 仓库 安装并准备环境 brew install hugo # 初始化 hugo new site blog cd blog && git init # 添加源仓库 git remote add origin https://github.com/liuyinz/blog.git # 添加github-pa
